timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="web_request_warning_message">Seien Sie sehr vorsichtig, bevor Sie den Zugriff zulassen, da der Link Ihre persönlichen Daten offenlegen kann, z. B. Ihren genauen geografischen Standort oder Text. Sie haben böswillige andere oder die Öffentlichkeit betreten. Siehe unsere <a href=%1s%gt;wiki%a> Weitere Informationen, warum dies äußerst gefährlich sein kann.</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="web_request_warning_message">Sei sehr vorsichtig, bevor du den Zugriff zulässt, da der Link anderen oder der Öffentlichkeit deine persönlichen Daten offenlegen kann, z.B. deinen genauen geografischen Standort oder Texte, die du eingegeben hast. Siehe unser <a href=%1s>wiki</a> für weitere Informationen, warum dies äußerst gefährlich sein kann.</string>
timeline.author: wslany
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1000,35 +1034,48 @@ Die vorangegangene, veraltete Version unserer Datenschutzrichtlinie (2.0) finden
     <string name="brick_web_request">Webanfrage senden an</string>
     <string name="brick_web_request_default_value">https://catrob.at/joke</string>
     <string name="brick_web_request_result">und speichere Antwort in</string>
-    <string name="web_request_warning_title">Allow web access?</string>
-    <string name="web_request_warning_message">Be very careful before allowing access, since the
-        link may expose your personal information, such as your precise geographical location or any text
-        you have entered to malicious others or to the public. See our
-        <a href=%1s>wiki</a> for more information why this can
-        be extremely dangerous.
-    </string>
-    <string name="web_request_trust_domain_warning_title">Always allow web access?</string>
-    <string name="web_request_trust_domain_warning_message">By always allowing access, you will
-        not be asked again to confirm web addresses from this domain.
-    </string>
-    <string name="trusted_domains_edit_hint">If you want to revoke this permission
-        later, you can remove the entry from the list of trusted domains in
-        the settings of this app.
-    </string>
-    <string name="brick_look_request">Get image from</string>
+    <string name="web_request_warning_title">Erlaube Web Zugriff?</string>
+    <string name="web_request_warning_message">Seien Sie sehr vorsichtig, bevor Sie den Zugriff zulassen, da der Link Ihre persönlichen Daten offenlegen kann, z. B. Ihren genauen geografischen Standort oder Text. Sie haben böswillige andere oder die Öffentlichkeit betreten. Siehe unsere <a href=%1s%gt;wiki%a> Weitere Informationen, warum dies äußerst gefährlich sein kann.</string>

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -721,61 +665,58 @@
     <string name="accountName">E-Posta</string>
     <string name="signin_thanks">Kayıt olduğunuz için teşekkür ederiz!</string>
     <string name="signin_choose_username">Lütfen kullanıcı adınızı seçiniz:</string>
-    <string name="signin_choose_username_empty">Please enter a username.</string>
+    <string name="signin_choose_username_empty">Lütfen bir kullanıcı adı giriniz.</string>
     <string name="signin_choose_username_hint">Kullanıcı adınız gerçek adınız olmamalıdır.</string>
-    <string name="oauth_username_taken">Someone else already uses this name. Please choose a different one!</string>
+    <string name="oauth_username_taken">Başka biri zaten bu adı kullanıyor. Lütfen farklı bir tane seçin!</string>
     <string name="show_password">Parolayı göster</string>
-    <string name="sign_in_error">Something went wrong during sign in.</string>
-    <string name="error_google_plus_sign_in">Google sign-in error. Status: %s</string>
-    <string name="error_session_expired">Session expired, please log in.</string>
-    <string name="error_register_empty_username">Empty username</string>
-    <string name="error_register_username_as_email">Email address cannot be used as username</string>
-    <string name="error_register_invalid_username">Username should only contain letters (a–z), numbers (0–9),
-        dashes (-), underscores (_), and periods (.).</string>
-    <string name="error_register_username_start_with">Username should not start with dashes (-), underscores (_), or
-        periods (.).</string>
-    <string name="error_register_invalid_email_format">Invalid email format</string>
-    <string name="error_register_empty_password">Password field is empty</string>
-    <string name="error_register_password_at_least_6_characters">Password should be at least 6 characters</string>
+    <string name="sign_in_error">Oturum açma sırasında bir şeyler ters gitti.</string>
+    <string name="error_google_plus_sign_in">Google oturum açma hatası. Durum: %s</string>
+    <string name="error_session_expired">Oturumun süresi doldu, lütfen giriş yapın.</string>
+    <string name="error_register_empty_username">Kullanıcı adı boş</string>
+    <string name="error_register_username_as_email">E-posta adresi kullanıcı adı olarak kullanılamaz</string>
+    <string name="error_register_invalid_username">Kullanıcı adı yalnızca harf (a–z), rakam (0-9), tire (-), alt çizgi (_) ve nokta (.) İçermelidir.</string>
